class nexoclom2.particle_tracking.rk5_integrator.rk5Integrator¶

Runge Kutta integrator

Can run with either constant or variable step size.

Equations of motion:

t_n+1 = t+n + h x_n+1 = x_n + h*v_n v_n+1 = v_n + j_a_n frac_n+1 = frac_n**(h/tau_n)

Parameters:
outputOutput

nexoclom2 Output clas

Returns:
Final state of the system
step(prev_step, output, h)¶

Perform a single rk5 step.

See Numerical Recipes, 3rd edition, chapter 17.2
